Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers

Class CloudController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers.PageController
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers.CloudController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CloudController extends PageController implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
CloudController displays the Clouds on GUI

    • back

      public void back(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Method is connected to the "Go Back" Button in the fxml file, it opens the GameBoard scene
      See Also:
      • ActionEvent

    • setClouds

      public void setClouds(CloudManagerData cloudManagerData, boolean expertModeEnabled)
      Displays the clouds according to the information received by CloudManagerData
      Parameters:
      cloudManagerData - the CloudManagerData received from the ServerHandler
      expertModeEnabled - true if expert mode is enabled

    • selectCloud

      public void selectCloud(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Method is called when the client clicks on a cloud.
      Parameters:
      event -
      See Also:
      • MouseEvent

    • updateClouds

      public void updateClouds(CloudManagerData cloudManager)
      Method is called when the client receives an UpdateCloudManager. It calls the method modifyCloud(int, CloudData) to display the Clouds correctly.
      Parameters:
      cloudManager - the data that needs to be updated
      See Also:
      • UpdateCloudManager

    • updateCloud

      public void updateCloud(CloudData cloud)
      This method is called when the client receives an UpdateCloud message, after a cloud has been picked
      Parameters:
      cloud - the cloud that has been chosen
      See Also:
      • UpdateCloud

    • updateTurnState

      public void updateTurnState(TurnState turnState, boolean isTheirTurn, boolean isLastRound)
      This method is called every time the TurnState changes, this way the scene can display the "Activate Character Card" button or "End Turn" if the TurnState is END_TURN
      Parameters:
      turnState - the current TurnState
      isTheirTurn - true if it's the turn of the client
      See Also:
      • TurnState

    • modifyCloud

      public void modifyCloud(int cloudIndex, CloudData cloudData)
      This method manages the students on the chosen Clouds and displays the students according to the CloudData
      Parameters:
      cloudIndex - index of the Cloud that has to be modified
      cloudData - data of the Cloud from the model

    • endTurn

      public void endTurn(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Fires a change to the ServerHandler containing an EndTurnMessage()
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
      See Also:
      • ActionEvent
      • EndTurnMessage

    • activateCharacterCard

      public void activateCharacterCard(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      If the "Activate Character Card" Button is clicked, this method is called. It opens the Characters' scene.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
      See Also:
      • ActionEvent
